facts.fact: Her name is inspired by Princess Oriana from Felix the Cat, So without Felix, we may not have had Thank U, Next.
Ariana doesn’t scare easily. She loves horror movies and can’t get enough of them.
Her favourite film is Bruce Almighty, She even recreated a scene from the movie on stage one time!
5. She has 9 dogs! Their names are Cinnamon, Coco, Fawkes, Ophelia, Toulouse, Sirius, Strauss, Pignoli and Lafayette. And most of them are rescue dogs. Awww!
She LOVES Harry Potter. She named her cute black dog after Sirius Black.
She’s quite short. Ariana is 5 foot 2, which makes her a lot shorter than her buddy Taylor Swift.
She first appeared on YouTube way back in 2007!
She was never in her school choir, She’s now a world-famous singer, but Ariana never made it into her school choir. Bet they regret that!
